dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is gaining more and more momentum as a new approach for patients surveillance In many monitoring parameters electrocardiography is the most important especially for monitoring patients with serious cardiovascular diseases They need to be monitored frequently in order to detect any deterioration In this paper we design a electrocardiographic telemetry system using General Packet Radio Service GPRS This design adds to traditional Holter capability of monitoring the patients heart anywhere anytime
Sheng wu yi xue gong cheng xue za zhi = Journal of biomedical engineering = Shengwu yixue gongchengxue zazhi
[Design of a cardiac monitoring system using mobile communications].
